subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade scored 19 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter, and the host Miami Heat rallied from a 10-point deficit to defeat the Nets, 99-94, on Monday night.
snippet: Dwyane Wade scored 19 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter, and the host Miami Heat rallied from a 10-point deficit to defeat the Nets, 99-94, on Monday night.
